item.title: UK Considers Banning Ransomware Payments
item.description:
The proposed mandate intends to discourage criminals from targeting critical national infrastructure and public services, as there will be no financial motivation.

Go to Source

item.title: IBM’s Acquisition of HashiCorp Investigated by UK Competition Authority
item.description:
HashiCorp provides hybrid and multi-cloud lifecycle management products that could assist IBM’s customers with their AI ambitions.

Go to Source
